nodes.documentation:
Profile for resolving type of issuance expect for a role.
The types are mutually exclusive. A role can only have a single type at a time.
These possible types are:
00: Approval by some identity (i.e. an identity from a list of DIDs, or an identity with a given role)
10: “Real-time” approval by a smart contract.
nodes.name: IssuerTypeResolver
setIssuerType
issuerType

attributes.name: IssuerTypeResolver
setIssuerType
issuerType

issuerType(bytes32).notice: Returns the issuerType associated with a role def.

setIssuerType(bytes32,uint8).notice: Sets the issuerType associated with a role def. May only be called by the owner of that node in the ENS registry.

userdoc.notice: Profile for resolving type of issuance expect for a role. The types are mutually exclusive. A role can only have a single type at a time. These possible types are: 00: Approval by some identity (i.e. an identity from a list of DIDs, or an identity with a given role) 10: “Real-time” approval by a smart contract.
